channel.title: Help with my server making ( i have done tutorial)
channel.description:
Well, it looks like im noobi but i cant connect to my server. i have pics and a short video I gonna telle u whats the problem.
Wel the first i have doing the tutorial i have edit the source making no-ip adress. than i get it online and prob to connect, its wont works i see that i need to portforward. I did that and just (u see in pics) or i think my ports are not just. I see that i need change the port of firewall and route change to 43594 but idk how. And i have seen, (some times) the servers ofline = wait like 2 sec for see "error connecting to server" and its off And (every time) if server on i need wait same 2 sec with this ip: [I DONT TELL WITH IM DOING ADVERTAINSION] If any would help me with testing this problem mail me: floradvance@hotmail.com
Picture that i have portforward it:
[img][url=http://img175.imageshack.us/my.php?image=gfbgfbmg7.png][img=http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/2907/gfbgfbmg7.th.png][/url][img]
Hope you can help me. Roli --- The feature is now...---

item.title: Help with my server making ( i have done tutorial)
item.dc:creator: @roli roli
item.description:
@roli wrote:

Yah, but i think i need change my ports of firewall and router. And can it that i need put in my gateway of the no-ip ?, and no im dont using 127.0.0.1 for test i have used.

EDIT i have maked a picture:
[img=http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/5279/helpingdz0.th.png]

Read full topic

item.description:

at NO-IP.com did you do what it said and went to the downloads tab at the top of the screen, chose your operating system (windows, mac, etc.) and clicked download? it would download no-ip duc20 to where u get ur ip working…

item.title: Help with my server making ( i have done tutorial)
item.dc:creator: @roli roli
item.description:
@roli wrote:

Well, it looks like im noobi but i cant connect to my server.
i have pics and a short video
I gonna telle u whats the problem.

Wel the first i have doing the tutorial i have edit the source making no-ip adress.
than i get it online and prob to connect, its wont works i see that i need to portforward.
I did that and just (u see in pics) or i think my ports are not just.
I see that i need change the port of firewall and route change to 43594 but idk how.
And i have seen, (some times) the servers ofline = wait like 2 sec for see “error connecting to server” and its off
And (every time) if server on i need wait same 2 sec with this ip: [I DONT TELL WITH IM DOING ADVERTAINSION]
If any would help me with testing this problem mail me: floradvance@hotmail.com

Picture that i have portforward it:

[img][img=http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/2907/gfbgfbmg7.th.png][img]

Hope you can help me.
Roli — The feature is now…—
